snippet.title: Out There: Oceans of Time - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
http://oceansoftime.outtheregame.com/

Explore a vast, breath-taking comic book galaxy as you and your crew race to stop the legendary alien menace who escaped on your watch. Out There: Oceans of Time is an ambitious blend of sci-fi interactive fiction, strategy, and survival like nothing you've played before.

In a far-flung corner of the universe where humans are a mistrusted minority, you were entrusted with transported the most dangerous being alive to an impregnable prison—and it escaped. Now you must lead a team of explorers, misfits, and bounty hunters on a galaxy-spanning mission of redemption to find the Archon and recapture it before it is too late.

Out There: Oceans of Time is the sequel to Out There, the half-million-unit-selling indie hit from Mi-Clos Studio. An ambitious new vision for the Out There universe, Oceans of Time will thrill fans of the previous game but you don't need to have played the original to love this new edition: Oceans of Time is a standalone story in the Out There saga.

Trailer credits
Michael Peiffert: Creative Director
Sarah Girardot: 3D Art
Coralie Defarge: 3D Art
Jonathan Sylvestre: Animation & Camera Mapping
Jonathan Ramelli: FX, Post-Processing & Rendering
Siddhartha Barnhoorn: Music
Charles Bardin: Sound Design
